full_text: Bees el Pook ape caen ie ope 2017/KER/49772 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA FRIDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2017/17TH AGRAHAYANA, 1939 Cri.MC.No. 7768 of 2017 () CC 808/2015 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT PETITIONER(S): SANJEEV KUMAR K.P, AGED 41 YEARS, S/O. LATE ASHOK KUMAR, RADHALAYAM, METHOTTU THAZAM P.O., KOMMERI, CALICUT. BY ADVS.SRI.LAL K.JOSEPH SRI.A.A.ZIYAD RAHMAN RESPONDENT(S): 1. STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA - 682 031. 2. THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, KOZHIKODE TOWN POLICE STATION -677 602. 3. K.P. PAVITHRAN, S/O. RAGHAVAN NAMBIAR, KANI RAWTHER, CHALIYIL HOUSE, TRILLANKERRY, MATTANOOR, KANNUR - 677 101. R1&R2 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. SHEEBA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 08-12-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: sdr/- Bees el Pook ape caen ie ope 2017/KER/49772 Cri.MC.No. 7768 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' ANNEXURES ANNEXURE A1 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR NO. 659/11 OF KOZHIKODE TOWN POLICE STATION AND THE FINAL REPORT NUMBERED AS C.C.808/15. ANNEXURE A2 TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT NUMBERED AS C.C 808/15. ANNEXURE A3 TRUE COPY OF THE PRIVATE COMPLAINT FILED BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE, COURT - 1, KOZHIKODE. ANNEXURE A4 TRUE COPY OF THE CONTINUATION OF THE NEWS WHICH CAME IN SAYANNA NEWS PAPER DAILY IN THE YEAR 20713. RESPONDENT(S) ANNEXURES NIL /TRUE COPY/ PA TO JUDGE sdr/- 2017/KER/49772 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017 ORDER Presently, when allegations are there, there is absolutely nothing to quash the proceedings in CC.808/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Kozhikode. At the same time, it is open to the petitioner to move the court below under Section 239 Cr.PC., in case that stage is not over. This Crl.M.C. is disposed of accordingly. lt has been pointed out that the petitioner has been implicated in a series of crimes by the police at the instance of the 3 respondent complainant and his associates. After the filing of the Crl.m.C., he has been placed under arrest and presently, he is in custody. The District Police Chief, Pe orcs 2017/KER/49772 Crl.M.C.7768/2017 :2: Kannur shall see that the petitioner is produced before the court below in CC.808/2015 on the next posting date for enabling him to file an application under Section 239 Cr.P.C. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/08/12 // True Copy // PS to Judge
